title: Bug 118780 - Incorrect column names shown in expression builder when selecting a dataset with alias set for columns
description: When aliasing columns in a dataset, the expression builder still displays the old column names instead of the alias when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting a dataset with alias set for columns in the expression builder, the old column names are shown instead of the alias.
EB: When selecting a dataset with alias set for columns in the expression builder, the alias of the columns should be displayed.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new datasource and dataset.
2. Set alias for the first column in the dataset to 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
5. The expression builder should display the alias 'column1' for the first column instead of the old column name.
